data.text: @mazdzer @michaelstrahan @GStephanopoulos @RobertMar @JustinTrudeau You gotta meet our Classroom Champions. Remarkable and inspiring relationships between athletes and youth! You’ll love us!
@littlegentlema3 @mazdzer @michaelstrahan @GStephanopoulos @RobertMar @CMazdzer Report that account. I did. Hit the three little dots in upper right.

@mazdzer @michaelstrahan @GStephanopoulos @RobertMar Not going to lie, I loved watching luge at the #Olympics but what @mazdzer is doing is really remarkable & life changing. I can't match 5K, but still felt moved to donate. Keep up the good work!
@mazdzer @michaelstrahan @GStephanopoulos @RobertMar This story just gets better and better, @mazdzer. Thank you!!

@mazdzer @michaelstrahan @GStephanopoulos @RobertMar Another thank you from a @ClassroomChamps teacher!!! Come visit our class to see just how amazing this program is!!! @MayaClassChamps would love to share with you all!!! @mazdzer rules!!!

@mazdzer @elainehordo @michaelstrahan @GStephanopoulos @RobertMar WOW- as a former teacher with CC and now an employee on maternity leave- I cannot personally thank you enough!! The impact you have as a mentor is priceless but this is beyond words. Thank you!
